tasks.task: Planting onion sets in a no-dig bed and a hugelkultur bed.
subtasks: Prepare to plant onion sets.
Select Shakespeare and Sensue yellow onion varieties.
Determine the appropriate planting time (October 5th).
Plant onion sets at the correct depth (5cm).
Space onion sets 10cm apart.
Keep rows spaced 20cm apart.
Plant onion sets in the no-dig bed.
Create a no-dig bed (layering compost, mulch, etc.).
Plant onion sets in the hugelkultur bed.
Construct the hugelkultur bed using decaying wood and organic matter.
Water the planted onion sets if needed.
Cover the soil surface with raking.

tasks.task: Compare the growth of onions in the no-dig bed vs. hugelkultur bed.
subtasks: Monitor the onions' growth over time.
Document updates on onion growth in subsequent videos.
Engage with viewers by checking comments for tips and experiences.
Encourage subscribers.
Invite viewers to leave comments.
Promote upcoming videos.
